bug.author: gengtsh
bug.description: hi when i make launch, i got the Building CXX object LibCarla/cmake/server/CMakeFiles/c....dir///source/carla/opendrive/parser/GeometryParser.cpp. FAILED: ../../LibCarla/source/carla/opendrive/parser/GeometryParser.cpp:118:21: error: loop variable 'geo' of type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::Geometry' creates a copy from type 'const type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::Geometry &' to prevent copying for (auto const geo : geometry) { ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Building CXX object LibCarla/cmake/server/CMakeFiles/c...rver.dir///source/carla/opendrive/parser/RoadParser.cpp. FAILED: ./../LibCarla/source/carla/opendrive/parser/RoadParser.cpp:299:12: note: use reference type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::RoadTypeSpeed &' to prevent copying for (auto const s : r.speed) { ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~ & ../../LibCarla/source/carla/opendrive/parser/RoadParser.cpp:310:23: error: loop variable 's' of type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::LaneSection' creates a copy from type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::LaneSection' [-Werror,-Wrange-loop-construct] for (auto const s : r.sections) { ^ ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~ & ../../LibCarla/source/carla/opendrive/parser/RoadParser.cpp:290:21: error: loop variable 'r' of type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::Road' creates a copy from type 'const carla::opendrive::parser::Road' [-Werror,-Wrange-loop-construct] for (auto const r : roads) { ^ ../../LibCarla/source/carla/opendrive/parser/RoadParser.cpp:290:10: note: use reference type 'const 'size_t' (aka 'unsigned long') to 'double' may lose precision [-Werror,-Wimplicit-int-float-conversion] double delta_p = 1.0 / number_intervals; PS: i use clang++-10, ubuntu 20.04 i try to install clang++-8 on Ubuntu 20;04, but failed any help are welcome

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Axel1092>@Axel1092</denchmark-link> could you please look into this?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gengtsh>@gengtsh</denchmark-link> , These errors are probably due to using clan10 instead of clang8. What problems did you find with installing clang8? Unreal Engine is compiled with this version of clang and mixing version may produce errors. I suggest to try to find a way to use clang8.

hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Axel1092>@Axel1092</denchmark-link> , i remove everything related to clang10 and reinstall clang8, it looks like this issues is fixed, but i encounter other issues: see the links below: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/3020>#3020</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/3021>#3021</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>

What problems did you find with installing clang8? Unreal Engine is compiled with this version of clang and mixing version may produce errors. I suggest to try to find a way to use clang8.
— You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#2988 (comment)>, or unsubscribe <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEEK7BKJW7Z5LYJOHLVX6XTRZX3NVANCNFSM4OGAALIA> .
